author: benjaminion
content: At the target run-rate of 3 blobs per slot, they conveniently add up to almost exactly 1 TB / year. (128 x 3 x 7200 x 365)

author: parithosh
content: If 1TB is stored using cloudflare r2, that would be ~15USD/mo for storage + x $/year for retreival. https://developers.cloudflare.com/r2/pricing/ (that's one of our plans for long term archival)

author: bridge-bot
content: <dankrad> > <dankrad>  That is correct (re @merge_chat_bot: <nishant0> They cant be larger or smaller)
